transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Madam ye kya ye kya hua tha ye?
Customer: Matlab?
Customer: Ye IndiaMART ne mujhe just thodi der pehle message aaya tha ki mera primary number aur primary mail id change hua hai. And right now mujhe aapki taraf se
Executive: Ji?
Executive: Kiske through change ho gaya hai?
Customer: IndiaMART ka message aaya mujhe.
Executive: Aap ek bari screenshot dijiye mujhe. Aapka pehle mujhe whatsapp number bataiye.
Customer: Whatsapp number 9823140712.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute sir. Kya bata rahe hai 98
Customer: 231
Executive: 40
Executive: 40
Customer: 712
Executive: 712 sir. Ek second. Aur mail bhi de do.

Executive: Dekha sir? Maine hi ka likha hai message.

Customer: Aaya aapko?
Executive: Ek minute ek minute.
Executive: Haan aa gaya hua hai. Theek hai main abhi aapko screenshot bhejta hu.
Executive: Haan, bhejiye.
Executive: Mobile number aur mail id change hui hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nahi, sorry yahan se na hum main mobile number change kar sakti na main yahan se mail id change kar sakti hu sir.
Customer: Dekhiye dekhiye maine aapko message forward kiya hai. Dear Monus Thomas last this this sales@salesglobaltech.com and timing bhi dekh lijiye ye uska bhi screenshot bhej raha hu main.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega. Has been changed. Updated on like click here to with the detail. Primary mobile number. Ye to aapka jo yahan pe naam hai ye to Sarath Palai pe hai. Aap yahan pe jo aap bata rahe ho wo Monus karke hai Monus naam se.
Customer: Madam ye IndiaMART se mail aaya hua hai na.
Executive: Aapka jo suniye aapka jo show hai jo number mere paas jo primary number hai wo 712 karke hai.
Customer: Right.
Executive: 712 mere paas jo hai main aapko screenshot share karti hu mere paas jo number hai aur aapka kis naam se hai wo main share karti hu aapko. Rukiyega.
Executive: Aapka koi aur is number se profile bana hoga yahan to check kariye. Mere paas ye wala profile hai aapka. Main screenshot share karti hu aapko. Check kariye.
Customer: Madam baat sahi hai lekin mail dekhiye aapne old email kya likha hua hai usme.
Executive: Aur ye primary mobile number rukiye 986 rukiye main check karti hu aapka. Ye ye hamara ex employee ka tha jo yahan se chod ke chala gaya uski vajah se main kafi pachtaya hu main. Ab mujhe ye mail id dikha raha hai old email id change to. 984645 sir ye wala number mujhe bataiyega main dekhu ye wale number pe hua hoga 98
Customer: 464
Customer: 464
Customer: 5358
Customer: 5358
Executive: Nahi 98 Theek hai abhi mujhe ye bataiye. Rukiye rukiye sir 98464535
Customer: 38
Customer: 38
Executive: Ye Infra karke tha kya sir? Infra Elevator India Private Limited Palakkad se.
Customer: Haan ye ye bande ka number hai jo hamare sath bhi kaam kar raha tha lekin uske kya bolte hain attitude ki vajah se usko bhaga diya tha yahan se. Theek hai. Achcha abhi wo uske naam pe tha ye pehle wala primary number haan.
Executive: Sir ye wala jo hai mere paas aapka profile nahi hai aur ye jo profile pe aapka number change hua hai ye hamare paas running hi nahi hai service search pe to dusra screenshot share kiya. Madam to fir ye mail aaya kaise?
Executive: Sir ye aapka raha hoga na aapke paas ye mail aaya hoga run nahi kar rahi hai services dekhiye Monus. Madam main time madam ek second ek second main na aapko sniping tool pura aapka ye bhej dikhata hu.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Isme aap date aur time dono dekh lijiye. Ye abhi aapko kaise main bhejta hu ek second.
Executive: Ye lekin matlab risky business hai aapke sath to ye. Koi bhi banda. Ek minute aap line pe rahiye main check karti hu rukiye.
Executive: Main abhi dekho uska pura screenshot main bhejta hu main aapko.
Executive: Dekhiye main aapko screenshot bheja pure mail ka. Hello. Hello dekhiye maine aapko pura screenshot bheja hai. 5:30 am aaj ki tarikh ka mail hai ye. Achcha ye customer care se hi mail aaya hua hai aapke paas. Haan to mail pe. Sir dekhiye abhi ye profile dekhiye sir ye wala profile aapka run nahi kar raha hai jo aap bata rahe ho na elevator wala aap isko ignore karo jo aapka run kar raha hai yahan pe IndiaMART ke through ye global tech wala run kar raha hai sir. To wahi to hai kuch na package chal raha hai na kuch chal raha hai sir. Madam ye sales@globaltech elevators@gmail.com yahi to hai email. Isi pe to aapke mails aa rahe hain. Abhi aapka jo ticket number ticket khola tha wo bhi mail isi pe aaya hai na. Sir jo aapka jo mail aaya hai wo hamare paas wo aapke paas mail pahunch raha hai sir sales@rate wale pe but jo aapke profile jo mere paas run kar rahi hai sir ye global tech wali run kar rahi hai global tech wale pe jo hai aapka mail id ye wale sab added hai sir. Main aapko dikhati hu. Maine bhi ek ek main screenshot leke bhejti hu. Matlab wo wala mail id wo wala bhi IndiaMART wala account running hi kar rahe hain aap. Sir dekhiye ye do mail id diya hua hai is pe aapne dekhiye jo Sarath Palai wala aur global tech wala hai mere paas dekhiye. Ye do mail id hai primary wo hai secondary ye hai sales wali.
Executive: Kaunsa kaunsa dekhiye ye wala ye dono ye mail id hai jo Sarath wale mein jo global tech wale jo run kar raha hai mere paas. Ye do mail id aur ye do phone number hai. sales@gmail.com right. Sir wo wala pehle wala jo issue sir wo pehle wala ho sakta hai ki login kiya ho galti se ya kuch hua ho to wahan se mail aa gayi ho aapke paas but usko aap ignore kariye usme aapka kuch bhi run nahi kar raha wo IndiaMART wale hi mail kar rahe hain koi other kisi ne bhi open nahi kiya kisi aur ne kuch bhi check nahi kiya hai. To aap pareshan mat huiye aapka jo run kar raha hai wo global tech pe hi chal raha hai kuch global tech mein koi dikkat aayegi ya kuch problem hai wo main baithi hui hu sir. Kuch changes global tech mein nahi hua hai jo aapka kuch agar changes hua bhi hai aur mail bhi jo aayi hai wo IndiaMART ke customer care se hi aayi hai aap ye bhi check kariye jo aapne mujhe bheja hai ye mail bhi customer care ke through hi aayi hai.
Executive: Samajh nahi aaya kya bol rahi. Hello kya bol rahi. Haan theek hai. Haan kyunki sir ye run hi nahi kar raha aapka ye Monus Thomas wala profile hai hi nahi hum pe run hi nahi kar raha sir. Aapko maine dono profile bheje dekhiye wo wala blue colour se show kar raha hai Infra Elevator India Private Limited is pe services hi run nahi kar rahi hai aur jo green colour se global tech wala hai ye mere paas hai jiski service aapke paas run kar rahi hai hamare paas aapki. Wo jo number diya tha usme kuch bhi message ya kuch ja nahi raha hai na. Haan nahi ja raha sir wo jo aapka profile hai na sir us pe kuch bhi run nahi kar raha hai sir aur sir profile bhi nahi hai bas number usme added hai aur number hi keval added hai aur kuch bhi nahi hai sir koi us pe call tak nahi karta hai IndiaMART ke through. Theek hai. Haan to ye global tech aapka sahi chal raha hai sir main global tech hi dekhiye wo wale pe aap ignore kariye cheezon us pe sab kuch band hai aapka aur wo jo mail aaya bhi hai sir IndiaMART ki taraf se hi aaya hai kuch idhar udhar chhedkhani nahi hui hai. Theek hai? Okay. Aur koi doubt? Nahi theek hai. Nahi hai na sir to main jo aapka concern mere paas open hua hai sir aapne 9696 ko call kiya hai to ye main hi account aapka handle kar rahi hu to mere paas hi aapka call aaya hai. Account nahi handle kar rahi hu shayad last time meri aapse baat bhi hui thi to aapne mujhe bola tha ki shayad Malayalam aati hai mere account managers ko aapse baat nahi kar payenge wo right aapko yaad hoga shayad. Isiliye isiliye main turant call kiya na ki aise mail aaya to fir mujhe to call karna hi padega. Haan kar rahe hain ji ji bilkul bilkul koi dikkat nahi sir to main yahi bolna chahungi to main ye wala concern aapka close kar du jo global tech mein galti se open ho gaya hai. Okay. Haan na to main aapko ye ticket concern close kar deti hu mere feedback ke liye aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega. Aap pareshan mat huiye sir aapka ye global tech wala sahi chal raha hai global tech mein hi aapne paise diye hue hain ye running hai aur wo wala bilkul band ho chuka hai. Ho sakta hai login hua ho IndiaMART share kar rahi ho details ki rahi hai aapko shayad ki aap ho sakta hai karana chahte ho us pe to isliye bhej diya ho waise kuch bhi kuch bhi dikkat nahi hai sir aur jo mail aayi hai wo bhi IndiaMART ki taraf se hi aayi hai. Theek hai. Theek hai sir aap is pe hi aap isko hi dekhe global tech wale ko aur kuch bhi dikkat hoti hai mujhe direct call kar liya kariye mera naam Preeti hai sir. Aap number bhi save kar lo last time maine aapko bheja bhi tha aapne shayad mera number save kiya ya nahi kiya I don't know aap please is baar mera number save kar lo sir. Theek hai. Theek hai aur main iska concern close kar du? Okay. Haan na aur sir kaisa chal raha hai waise leads wagera hamara? Wo baad me batata hu pehle mujhe mere staff se baat karne dijiye main call karta hu aapko. Chaliye theek hai aap staff se baat kar lo main aapko fir connect karungi sir theek hai. Okay baki main
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a mail regarding profile changes.

- Wants to verify the authenticity of the mail.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the customer's account details.

- Clarified the customer about the running profile.

- Confirmed the mail was from IndiaMART customer care.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, mail, subscription, verification
